aurora.neighborhoods: Aurora Highlands, Parker Road Corridor, City Center (A-Town), Del Mar, Heather Gardens, Meadow Hills
aurora.meetingHighlights: Growing suburban meetings with many community and church-based groups; active newcomer and study meetings around A-Town and Parker Road.
aurora.transitInfo: RTD light rail and bus connections link Aurora with Denver; Denver International Airport (DEN) is nearby for regional and international flights.

colorado-springs.neighborhoods: Old Colorado City, Broadmoor, Downtown, Ivywild, North End, Briargate
colorado-springs.meetingHighlights: Active mountain-region fellowship with strong downtown and Broadmoor area meetings; many outdoor and recovery events tied to the Pikes Peak community.
colorado-springs.transitInfo: Mountain Metropolitan Transit (MMT) provides city bus service; Colorado Springs Airport (COS) serves regional routes.

boulder.areaDescription: Boulder area at the base of the Rocky Mountains
boulder.neighborhoods: Pearl Street, University Hill, North Boulder, South Boulder, Chautauqua, Gunbarrel
boulder.meetingHighlights: Progressive college-town fellowship with active meetings near CU Boulder campus; strong focus on young people's meetings and outdoor recovery events in the Flatirons.
boulder.transitInfo: RTD bus service connects Boulder to Denver; Regional Transportation District (RTD) routes serve Boulder County.

denver.neighborhoods: LoDo, River North (RiNo), Capitol Hill, Uptown, Park Hill, Cherry Creek
denver.meetingHighlights: Large and diverse AA community with meetings across neighborhoods including downtown LoDo and RiNo; many specialty meetings and strong newcomer resources.
denver.transitInfo: RTD buses and light rail provide extensive coverage; Denver International Airport (DEN) is the major regional hub.

pueblo.neighborhoods: Downtown, Bessemer, Mesa Junction, Union Avenue
pueblo.meetingHighlights: Small-city meetings with solid neighborhood attendance; many groups meet in downtown churches and community centers.
pueblo.transitInfo: Pueblo Transit serves the city; Pueblo Memorial Airport (PUB) and regional highways provide access.
